reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is close to busy Khao San Road, but far enough away to escape the crowds. It is about 4 blocks off Khao San right on the canal. Some taxi drivers still have issues finding the place as I believe it is fairly new. (New hotel, older building) It is best to keep on hand the phone number for them, as I found they still had issues using the maps even though they seemed clear.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are taking a proper meter taxi from the airport, it shouldn't cost more then about 300 bhat plus the toll way prices. (tolls are about 25 and 40 bhat) It is best to offer to pay them the toll on route, otherwise we have found the driver will just pay the first one and then take another route in order to make more money off the fare.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Diamond House hotel for 2 nights while in Bangkok. I can't recommend this hotel enough. It's nicely located (about 5 mins from Kao San Road) and is quite central. The rooms are tastefully decorated. i suppose you could almost class it as a "boutique hotel." The rooms were clean, there are also safes in each room. Check out the knobs for the taps in the bathroom. You'll see what i mean!! The staff were fantastic, extremely polite, helpful and welcoming. The food was nice witha nice area in the lobby where you eat. There was also internet access in the lobby, five fairly good speed computers. Overall this is a good hotel. I would recommend it and will be staying there when I return to Bangkok in 2 months.
reviews.title: Great spot

likes.disliked: — The noise from the street but the hotel is where it is!

reviews.title: loved the food and the service
reviews.text: I stayed at the Diamond House in September 2007 and was really impressed with the food which was very fresh and well priced. In fact it was the food which first attracted me and after having lunch we asked to be shown around and then booked in. Staff were really helpful and the hotel has internet access (very reasonable) and a travel advisor. I was with my daughter but would feel equally safe on my own here as it felt like a family.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Diamond House during mid-January this year and found it to be absolutely gorgeous. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The food from the in-house kitchen was great - I can very highly recommend the Green Curry!
reviews.title: Gorgeous hotel, great for couples

reviews.text: The room we stayed at was on the top floor and despite being situated on a main road the room was not noisy at all. The roof terrace was a lovely place to hang out at night as the temperature cooled. When we stepped into the room we were immediately taken by the romantic nature of it - definately a good choice for couples! The bathroom was very small but we did not find this to be a problem. Perhaps my only complaint was the low water pressure in the shower (I love a good strong shower!) and that the lift only serviced floors 2-6; however, this was only an issue after a long, hot day of walking around the city. The location of the hotel was great in that we were not right on Khao San Rd, but only a short walk from it - the best of both worlds.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel, Caring Staff
